full_summary:
# F2402-230177 Marine Mammal Satellite Tracking Tags NISO

## Tender Details
### Reference Number
WS4265770886-Doc4265784542

### Amended Solicitation
This solicitation is for a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the provision and delivery of Marine Satellite Tracking Tags and associated equipment.

### Solicitation Information
- **Tender Number**: WS4265770886
- **Publication Date**: October 25, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 9, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 30, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2026

### Contracting Entity and End User
- **Contracting Entity (English)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity (French)**: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
- **End User (English)**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO)
- **End User (French)**: Pêches et Océans Canada (MPO)

### Notice Information
- **Notice Type (English)**: Advance Contract Award Notice
- **Notice Type (French)**: Préavis d'attribution du contrat
- **Notice URL (English)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17825313?extsite=MTc4MjUzMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Notice URL (French)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17825313?extsite=MTc4MjUzMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Selection Criteria
- The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including but not limited to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Contact Information
- **Contact Name (English)**: Zumbado Diaz, Willy
- **Contact E-mail (English)**: willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
